members.name: Lan Krajnčič
members.title: Game Designer
info: Fater of 2 children and this project. Our game designer and project lead. Huge collector of board games and a passionate KS backer

members.name: Marko Ilić Šuštarič
members.title: Graphic Designer
info: Graphic designer of the project, 3D video and the person responsible for dragging everyone on this hype train. Amazing salsa dancer!

members.name: Rok Malovrh
members.title: Artist
info: Responsible for illustrations of monsters, cover art and video. In a few years of drawing career still didn't manage to paint his girldfriend

members.name: Gal Krajnčič
members.title: PR and Marketing
info: Gal is the youngest member of this team. He is 23 years old and is currentlv finishing his masters degree in Communication and media studies. For our project he is in charge of PR, Social media and Marketing.
